return
Returns the value of the specified object.
Syntax
No parameters.
Note
The function is called using the
button, located in the Algorithm Editor on the "Algorithms" tabs.
Example
The result of the algorithmâ€™s calculation must be returned. Select the
return
function with the value to be output.
Other functions were also used to write this algorithm.
More details
The variable is declared using the
var
function.
The calculation (rounding) of the date is done using the
truncDate
function.
